properties.description: Attractive three bedroom semi-detached family home situated within 0.5 miles of Petts Wood station with fast trains to London and within easy walking distance of local shops, schools, bus routes and National Trust woodland. The property comprises; two receptions, fitted 18'9 x 10'1 kitchen/breakfast room and conservatory. The property also benefits from having a utility room and cloakroom. To the first floor there are three bedrooms and a family bathroom with separate WC. Additional features include double glazing, gas central heating and a well presented interior...
properties.shortDescription: Charming 3-bedroom family home near Petts Wood station, featuring two receptions, a conservatory, and modern kitchen.
properties.location: Petts Wood Road, Petts Wood, Orpington BR5

properties.description: Presented in excellent decorative order throughout is this two double bedroom, two bathroom, garden flat.The modern fitted kitchen is open plan to the living room which boasts solid wooden floors and includes integrated appliances including a dishwasher & a washing machine. This large open plan benefits from bi folding doors onto a secluded private courtyard garden. Both bedrooms are double sized, and the family bathroom boasts a matching three piece suite a shower attachment over the bath. There is also a separate wet room. There are walnut doors throughout and wiring for Sky TV/aerial points in the living room/kitchen and both bedrooms.This apartment being only five years old, is still under a 10 year building guarantee.
properties.shortDescription: Modern 2-bedroom garden flat with bi-fold doors, a courtyard, and stylish open-plan kitchen.

properties.description: This spacious four-bedroom detached bungalow is nestled in a peaceful cul-de-sac, offering an expansive living area with plenty of natural light. The property boasts a modern and fully equipped kitchen, perfect for culinary enthusiasts. It includes a large, beautifully landscaped garden ideal for relaxation and outdoor activities. Located close to excellent transport links and a variety of local amenities, this bungalow combines tranquility with convenience.
properties.shortDescription: Spacious 4-bedroom detached bungalow with a large garden, modern kitchen, and quiet cul-de-sac location.

properties.description: This well-maintained three-bedroom terraced house features a bright and inviting living room, a modern fitted kitchen, and a private garden perfect for outdoor gatherings. The property also includes off-road parking and is conveniently located near top-rated schools and excellent transport links, making it an ideal family home.
properties.shortDescription: Modern 3-bedroom terraced house with a private garden, off-road parking, and great school access.

properties.description: This beautiful one-bedroom apartment is situated in a newly built complex and features a contemporary open-plan kitchen and living area. The property boasts balcony access, offering a private outdoor space. The luxury bathroom suite is designed with modern finishes. This property is perfect for first-time buyers or investors seeking a stylish urban living space.
properties.shortDescription: Stylish 1-bedroom apartment with balcony access, open-plan living, and luxury bathroom suite.

properties.description: This charming two-bedroom cottage is filled with character, featuring exposed wooden beams and a cozy wood-burning stove. Set in a picturesque rural location, the property offers stunning countryside views and a large, well-maintained garden. Perfect for those seeking a peaceful retreat away from the hustle and bustle.
properties.shortDescription: Charming 2-bedroom cottage with rustic features, large garden, and stunning countryside views.

properties.description: This well-presented three-bedroom maisonette features a private entrance and spacious living areas. The modern kitchen is designed for convenience and style, while the property is located close to public transport and local amenities. Perfect for families or professionals seeking a comfortable and accessible home.
properties.shortDescription: Modern 3-bedroom maisonette with a private entrance, spacious living, and convenient location.

properties.description: Stunning two-bedroom penthouse with panoramic city views. Features an open-plan kitchen with premium appliances, a spacious living area, and a private terrace. Located in a prestigious development close to shops and transport links.
properties.shortDescription: Luxury 2-bedroom penthouse with panoramic views, private terrace, and premium finishes.

properties.description: Spacious four-bedroom townhouse with a modern kitchen, three bathrooms, and a large living room. The property also features a private garden, garage, and easy access to excellent schools and transport links.
properties.shortDescription: Modern 4-bedroom townhouse with private garden, garage, and excellent transport access.
